com.sonf.core.session

接口 IOConfig

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractIOConfig, AbstractSocketConfig, NioSocketConfig

    public interface IOConfig

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      long getIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status) 
      int getMaxWriteBytes() 
      int getReadBufferSize() 
      long getWriteTimeoutInMillis() 
      void setAll(IOConfig config)
      Sets all configuration properties retrieved from the specified config.
      void setIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status, long idleTimeInMillis)
      Sets idle time for the specified type of idleness in seconds.
      void setMaxWriteBytes(int maxWriteBytes)
      Set limitation for the number of written bytes for read-write fairness
      void setReadBufferSize(int readBufferSize)
      Sets the size of the read buffer that I/O processor used for session's read operation
      void setWriteTimeoutInMillis(long writeTimeoutInMillis)
      Sets write timeout in milliseconds.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setAll

        void setAll(IOConfig config)
        Sets all configuration properties retrieved from the specified config.
        参数:
        config - The configuration to use

      • getReadBufferSize

        int getReadBufferSize()
        返回:
        the size of the read buffer that I/O processor used for session's read operation. The default size is 2048 bytes

      • setReadBufferSize

        void setReadBufferSize(int readBufferSize)
        Sets the size of the read buffer that I/O processor used for session's read operation
        参数:
        readBufferSize - The size of the read buffer

      • getMaxWriteBytes

        int getMaxWriteBytes()
        返回:
        limitation for the number of written bytes per flush the default value is calculated automatically based on the default readBufferSize for read-write fairness

      • setMaxWriteBytes

        void setMaxWriteBytes(int maxWriteBytes)
        Set limitation for the number of written bytes for read-write fairness
        参数:
        maxWriteBytes - The maximum write bytes

      • getIdleTimeInMillis

        long getIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status)
        参数:
        status - The status for which we want the idle time (One of READER_IDLE, WRITER_IDLE or BOTH_IDLE)
        返回:
        idle time for the specified type of idleness in milliseconds.

      • setIdleTimeInMillis

        void setIdleTimeInMillis(IdleStatus status,
                         long idleTimeInMillis)
        Sets idle time for the specified type of idleness in seconds.
        参数:
        status - The status for which we want to set the idle time (One of READER_IDLE, WRITER_IDLE or BOTH_IDLE)
        idleTimeInMillis - The time in millisecond to set

      • getWriteTimeoutInMillis

        long getWriteTimeoutInMillis()
        返回:
        write timeout in milliseconds.

      • setWriteTimeoutInMillis

        void setWriteTimeoutInMillis(long writeTimeoutInMillis)
        Sets write timeout in milliseconds.
        参数:
        writeTimeoutInMillis - The timeout to set
